name: PaintZen
description: Stress Free Home and Office Painting
overview:
Specialties

Customized Interior Home and Office Painting - Stress Free.

From custom trim and ceiling painting to wall art and whiteboard painting for homes and businesses, we are equipped to handle any request. We also save you the hassle of going to the hardware store by bringing the paint at your request.

Services Include: Interior Home Painting, Interior Office Painting, Children’s Rooms Painting with Graphics, Chalkboard Painting, IdeaPaint, Custom Trim, Ceiling Painting, Custom Logos, Images and Graffiti Wall Art for Homes and Businesses, Asthma and Allergy-Safe Paint. Eco-friendly Paint ‘Green Promise’ Paints

At PaintZen, you’re in good hands. History

Established in 2013

PaintZen was founded in early 2013 by a group of colleagues who noticed that finding a trustworthy painting company or a reliable painter could prove to be a very daunting task. Thanks to the entrepreneurial experience of the colleagues, PaintZen was created to solve this problem!

The PaintZen team saw a high supply of bare walls and a high demand for certified painters. Hard work and research helped them to discover painters who are insured, licensed and bonded for your convenience. With this, PaintZen has been able to create a community of painters and apartment owners in New York City, specifically Manhattan, and help turn the bare to flair. Today, PaintZen is looking to expand it’s reach and connect it’s painting teams with more and more customers and to continue to expand it’s network of painters.
